conversation.speaker: Client
conversation.text: I feel joyful because I got promoted at work today.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: That’s wonderful—what about the promotion feels most exciting?

conversation.speaker: Client
conversation.text: I feel sad because my best friend stopped talking to me after our argument.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: That sounds really painful—what do you miss most about that connection?

conversation.speaker: Client
conversation.text: I feel angry because my coworker took credit for my work in front of the team.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: That would feel unfair—what went through your mind when it happened?

conversation.speaker: Client
conversation.text: I feel fearful because I heard footsteps outside my door last night.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: That sounds scary—what about that moment felt most threatening?

conversation.speaker: Client
conversation.text: I feel surprised because I suddenly got an email saying my flight was cancelled.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: That’s a big sudden change—what was your first reaction?

conversation.speaker: Client
conversation.text: I feel disgusted because the bathroom was covered in grime and smelled rotten.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: That sounds awful—what part of it bothered you the most?
